General_Description: '''Bounty on an Athenian Leader ''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description:
Kassandra noticed a bounty for the [[Athens|Athenian]] [[Nation Leader|Leader]] on a [[message board]]:
#"I know that (leader) does not deserve his position. He got where he is through intimidation alone. Someone needs to knock him down."
#"Law and order have broken down since (leader) took power. The roads are more dangerous than ever before. Please, someone end his rule."
#"(Leader) and his followers do as they please. Our sacred statues have been vandalized! Someone, please, have the strength to end that ''malákas''."
#"(Leader) demands good omens from us priestesses and punishes us if the omens are bad! We're not safe as long as he is in control."
#"(Leader) does not fulfill his promises to his people. All he does is take for himself. Drachmae to the one who can gut the [[pig]]."
#"(Leader) does nothing. The poor get poorer, and the rich get richer. There is no justice in the world. If there was, someone would gut the ''malákas''."
#"(Leader) sent a fleet of [[ship]]s right into the enemy. We'll lose everything with him in command! Let his flesh feed the worms, that's all he's good for."
#"Our cities are in disrepair while (leader) takes, takes, and takes some more. We must be free of this greedy tyrant. [[Drachma]]e if you can help us!"
#"Our lands are not protected since (leader) came into power. I've seen [[Wolf|wolves]] prowling closer to us each day! It's time for a change in leadership."
#"Since (leader) seized power, there has been a steady increase in [[bandit]] activity. It's not safe here anymore. Please, protect us and kill this tyrant."
#"Since (leader) took over, there has been a growing disrespect for our local shrines. They say (leader) does not fear the gods. Show him he should."
#"Since (leader) took over, [[Peloponnesian War|war]] has ravaged my village. Someone needs to gut the ''malákas'' and save our way of life! My drachmae to the one who manages it."
#"Since (leader) took over these parts, the [[soldier]]s are no longer kept in line. They're rowdy and abusive. We need a new leader around here."
#"The wilds are not as safe as they were. With (leader) in charge, bandits have become bolder. Maybe with (leader) dead, things will get better again."
#"There is corruption everywhere since (leader) took over. He spells bad news for us all. I fear a future with him in it. Who can end him?"
Section_Outcome: Kassandra accepted the contract, and slew the Athenian Leader, claiming the bounty.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: The bounty flavor texts are not bound to any single region or city.
